p: The assessment of underreporting, was restricted to Geisinger Health System patients whom were residents of Pennsylvania, enrolled as CHeCS participants, and diagnosed with a chronic HBV or HCV infection between 2001 and 2015. Chronicity was established by trained abstractors, by a review of laboratory results and/or patient medical records to ascertain specific ICD9 codes (ICD 9â€”International Classification of Diseases, Ninth Revision) for HBV (070.22, 070.23, 070.32, 070.33, 070.2, 070.20, 070.21, 070.3, 070.30, 070.31, V02.61) or HCV (070.41, 070.44, 070.51, 070.54, 070.70, 070.71) [ 17].
